messages.speaker: User
messages.content: hello! do you know if we as SMU students can access this resource in NUS? "https://scholarbank.nus.edu.sg/handle/10635/165175?mode=full"

messages.speaker: User
messages.content: I'm trying to refer to this particular thesis paper written by a NUS student but im not sure how to access it

messages.speaker: Help Desk
messages.content: This is PERSON_LASTNAME_2 from SMU Libraries. How may I help you?

messages.speaker: Help Desk
messages.content: Generally, we don't have access to their resources. For their subscribed resources, we may have a chance to get through inter-library loan. However, I see that this is a bachelor's thesis, which may be restricted to access by NUS community only.

messages.speaker: Help Desk
messages.content: I also see that you're currently a Year One student. If you'd wish to use the inter-library loan services, you will need to get in touch with your Research Librarian to get approval.
